DOC.brief_summary: Hemabate often use gynecological patient . Hemabate associate many side effect , include burn sensation stomach , nausea , vomit , diarrhea etc . It report dexmedetomidine reduce gastrointestinal reaction perioperative period . We design clinical trial find dexmedetomidine prevent side effect hemabate Cesarean Section patient .
DOC.criteria: gynecological patient Neuromuscular endocrine diseases Allergic reaction a2adrenergic agonist Previous abdominal surgery include prior caesarean section .
